title: Debug output 'remaining_stats' still leaking to display
description: The line 'remaining_stats='11 78'' is still appearing in Ralph output above the iteration box. BUG-006 was marked complete but the fix didn't work. Need to find and remove/redirect this echo statement.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Grep ralph.zsh for ALL debug echo statements (remaining_stats, debug, etc)
Wrap ALL debug output in: [[ "$RALPH_DEBUG" == "true" ]] && echo ...
Or redirect to debug log: echo ... >> /tmp/ralph-debug.log
Add comment '# DEBUG OUTPUT - guard with RALPH_DEBUG' above each debug line
Run Ralph 3+ iterations and confirm NO debug output leaks
Create grep command in docs to audit for unguarded debug output

technicalNotes: BUG-006 attempted to fix this but failed. The output appears right before the iteration box, suggesting it's in the iteration loop setup. Search for: echo.*remaining_stats or print.*remaining_stats
